features: TOILET CLEANING SYSTEM: Add this toilet bowl cleaner to your cleaning supplies including 1 ToiletWand, 1 storage caddy and 6 original disposable ToiletWand refills plus 10 Rainforest Rush scented refills that kill 99.9% of bacteria and viruses; Packaging may vary,
DISPOSABLE SPONGES: These toilet scrub pad refill heads click onto the ToiletWand to swish scrub and clean the toilet bowl and conveniently pop off to throw in the trash
DISINFECTING CLEANER: Preloaded with Clorox cleaner these disposable scrubbing pads deep clean and remove stains while eliminating germs to make your toilet bowl feel like new

BATHROOM CLEANING PRODUCTS: Eliminate the need to store a dirty germ-ridden toilet brush with the convenient caddy that stores your ToiletWand and refill heads for an all-in-one bathroom household cleaner
TOILET SCRUBBER: The hexagon shaped sponge heads clean in hard to reach places under the bowl rim and drain for a deeper and faster clean to remove rust, calcium and lime stains
body.description: Clorox ToiletWand Disposable Toilet Cleaning System is a convenient way to a quick clean toilet. The starter kit contains one wand, 6 original refills, 10 Rainforest Rush scented refills and 1 storage caddy to get you started on a deeper clean. Each disposable head is preloaded with Clorox Cleaner with 4x the powerful scrubbing action to clean tough stains, kill germs, remove rust, calcium and limescale while it disinfects and deodorizes with ease. Based on comparative lab tests, the toilet wand cleans better than a brush. The sponge like cleaning head is shaped so that you can get into every nook and cranny while killing 99.9% of germs like staphylococcus aureus, salmonella enterica, rhinovirus type 37 and influenza A. This all in one system is designed so that you get a brand new cleaning sponge every time you clean without having to touch a yucky brush. Just click your way to a cleaner toilet with the Clorox ToiletWand Disposable Toilet Cleaning Starter Kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use to use a traditional toilet brush. I was very hesitant to change the method We carry this product in each bathroom of our home. The amount of cleaner/sudds this offers is phenomenal. This toilet wand cleans the toilet, is easy to attach and release the scrub pad, and the perfect size to sit right in the corner. Great product and easy for kids to you use as well to learn household cleaning. I let my toilet get extremely dirty outside the 2 week routine to see if this toilet brush could hold up. It took 25 seconds to have my bowl clean again. Took the grime right off! I chose the original scent but am eager to buy replacements in another scent.Update: 10/10 do not recommend with children under 4 unless you keep the refills hidden or would just enjoy the refills flushed down the toilet, causing it to clog.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great product!
reviews.reviewText: Toilet bowl brushes are disgusting, I don’t want to keep something that cleans actual poop & pee kept in my bathroom. These are great, you can throw them away, if you buy in bulk to cost is manageable, especially if used together with the Scrubbing Bubbles gel stamps. I only need to give the inside of the bowl & under the seat a good cleaning once every 10 days or so & these clean real well. Very easy to use, The pad pops right into the wand, and when finished cleaning it comes off the wand into the garbage with 1 push of the only button. I was surprised by how much cleaning product gets on the toilet bowl, you can use 1 replacement pad for 2-3 toilet bowls, fully covering every inch of the bowl & seat with cleaning product. It smells nice and clean. Will buy again & again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on toilet.
reviews.reviewText: I actually really like this toilet bowl cleaner. It's easy to use. You don't have to touch anything gross. It clean great and smells great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Cleaning with Clorox ToiletWand – A Bathroom Essential!
reviews.reviewText: The Clorox ToiletWand Disposable Toilet Cleaning Kit has revolutionized the way I clean my bathroom. It's a simple yet highly effective system that makes toilet cleaning much less of a chore. Here’s my experience:Ease of Use: The ToiletWand is incredibly user-friendly. The handle is comfortable to hold, and attaching the cleaning heads is a breeze. It allows for easy reach inside the toilet bowl, making cleaning under the rim and in hard-to-reach areas effortless.Effective Cleaning: Each disposable head is preloaded with Clorox cleaner, providing a thorough clean that I can see and smell. It's effective at removing stains, eliminating odors, and disinfecting the toilet bowl, leaving it sparkling and hygienic.Hygienic Disposal: The no-touch disposal design is a standout feature. With a simple click, the used head goes straight into the trash, meaning no more storing of a germy toilet brush. This system is much more hygienic and convenient.Storage Caddy: The included storage caddy is compact and discreet, making it easy to keep the wand and refills neatly stored in the bathroom. It’s a tidy solution that keeps everything organized and ready to use.Disinfecting Power: Knowing that I'm using a product that disinfects and kills germs gives me peace of mind, especially in a household bathroom that gets frequent use. The Clorox formula is powerful and leaves the toilet sanitized after each use.Refill Heads: The kit comes with six refill heads, which I find to be a good starting quantity. They are easy to replace, and additional refills are readily available for purchase.Overall Experience: The Clorox ToiletWand Disposable Toilet Cleaning Kit is an excellent product for anyone looking to simplify their bathroom cleaning routine. It’s efficient, hygienic, and effective, making it one of my top recommendations for household cleaning tools.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are very convenient. My teen can clean the bathroom easily with these. They have an ok smell, they clean ok, and they're easy to detach right into the rubbish. I like that these come in a complete set ready to go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best invention ever
reviews.reviewText: I cant believe I waited so long to buy this! I have 1 in each bathroom and you can literally clean your toilet with one hand. The want is so easy to use, just push wand into a pad until it clicks and you're ready to use. There's enough soap on the pad to clean even the nastiest toilet. Push a button and it uncle's from wand into garbage. Amazing and no more gross toilet brushes in the bathroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a household with small ones!
reviews.reviewText: I have a toddler who loves to get into things. This ended up being such a great purchase for me because I could finally get rid of those nasty toilet brushes that he insisted on trying to get into! It is super easy to use and clean/sanitize after cleaning your toilets, and the brush heads come with the sanitizing cleaner already built into them. The only cons are that I have found are that the brush heads sometimes come apart from the wand while you're trying to scrub the toilet (which is really frustrating) and also that the brush heads are single-use, which is bad for the environment and your wallet. If not for that, I would totally love the concept!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Never will use the brush one again. These are amazing, very clean, and good price for peace of mind
Great to use don't have to touch anything and clean great!! Best invention ever
A mi esposa le encantó pues facilita la limpieza de excusado.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. It is easy to use & once introduced to water it is easy to froth & clean the whole toilet bowl….infact it would have done 2 toilets if I had 2!!The casing for the cleaning pads is a little flimsy but for me that doesn’t detract from the good cleaning quality & ease of cleaning of the whole thing. Also it’s easy to attach the pad to the rod & to detach & discard after use.
Me ha gustado todo es súper limpio y comodo
